duties_responsibilities.duty: Planning and managing test execution, resource allocation, and creating weekly test reports.
Leading software evaluation of head unit software across various domains such as HMI, Navigation, Bluetooth, VR/Voice Assistant, DCM Apps, OTA, user profile, and other legacy functions.
Communicating with mobile device manufacturers on potential device issues and tracking head unit software focused on all functions for upcoming new HU.
Creating and executing function and regression test plans based on feature requirements.
Communicating with Tier 1 suppliers on head unit software fixes and participating in Agile ceremonies including daily standup, sprint planning, sprint refinement, and sprint demo.
Flexibility with off-hour work as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
